alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or 11 miles north of The Redland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kendall, Sweetwater, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, The Crossings, Tamiami, University Park, The Hammocks, Fountainbleau, Richmond West, Sunset, Olympia Heights, Kendall West, Tamiami Fairgrounds, Fiu South Campus, Westwood Lakes and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
